de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2rq.sql

Class SQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2rq.sql.SQL

  • public class SQL
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses different types of SQL fragments from Strings, and turns them back into Strings. All methods are static.
    Author:
    Richard Cyganiak (richard@cyganiak.de)

      • parseJoins

        public static java.util.Set<Join> parseJoins(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> joinConditions)
        Builds a list of Join objects from a list of join condition strings. Groups multiple condition that connect the same two table (multi-column keys) into a single join.
        Parameters:
        joinConditions - a collection of strings
        Returns:
        a set of Join instances
